page.title: 10HEALTH
page.content: {General practitioner}services for this parish are served by 2 practices (1) Dr. Surtees and Partners from Corby Glen (2) the Ancaster Group Practice. Both visit patients when requested and hold regular surgeries at Ropsley Village Hall. If further treatment is required patients are referred to Grantham and Kesteven General{Hospital or Rauceby Psychiatric Hospital and then if necessary to their specialized hospitals further afield. For{social {welfare}help this parish is served by the Sleaford office of the Social Services Department of Lincolnshire County Council. The nearest{dentists and{opticians}are in Grantham. Health Visitor & District Nurse are available if required.
